title: Advanced Deep Learning Architectures
description: Explore the potential of novel architectures like Transformers, Capsule Networks, and Spiking Neural Networks for EEG-based fatigue detection.

examples.description: Introduces a Capsule Network (SACC-CapsNet) for improved learning from limited EEG data in fatigue detection.
examples.note: Added for its exploration of Capsule Networks, a novel architecture with potential for EEG-based fatigue detection.

examples.description: Highlights the potential of Transformers for capturing long-range dependencies in EEG signals.
examples.note: Added for its mention of Transformers, a novel architecture with potential for capturing long-range dependencies in EEG signals, relevant for advanced fatigue detection models.

examples.description: Proposes a low-power model combining SOM and SNN, indicating an exploration of spiking neural networks for efficiency.
examples.note: Added for its exploration of spiking neural networks, which is a promising direction for energy-efficient fatigue detection systems.

trend: Investigation of new deep learning architectures tailored for EEG signal analysis and fatigue detection.
